title: Skype usage reach in the United States 2018 , by age group
summary: This statistic shows the share of internet users in the Skype who were using Skype usage as of 2018 , sorted age group .
We Are Flint found that 52 % of internet users aged from 25 to 34 years used the social networking site 's usage platform .
gold: This statistic shows the share of internet users in the United States who were using Skype as of January 2018 , sorted by age group.
We Are Flint found that 51 percent of internet users aged from 18 to 24 years old used the telecommunications application software .
